content: Coming up at 6.... Governor Cuomo promising an additional 25  NY State Police officers.. on the streets of Suffolk County to fight the gang known as MS-13. We'll take a closer look at the factors that caused this problem to worsen.
name: Stacey Sager
title: Timeline Photos

content: President Trump blames the Obama Administration....But what about the Burke administration?? The former head of the Suffolk Police Dep't  - who is now a convicted felon... who WITHDREW his detectives from joint task forces designed to fight both drugs and gangs..end result???MS-13 continued to grow unchecked.. Like any complex problem... MS-13 has not one, but many root causes...more like a "perfect storm" here in Suffolk, and now it needs to be fought on many fronts. Hopefully it will be. Or more of our young people will die. Thoughts??
name: Stacey Sager
title: Cuomo orders extra officers to Suffolk Co. to combat murderous gang

content: 7:00 am. I guess Hamilton goes down well with pancakes for breakfast..Who knew? No, they haven't seen it. But yes, they are becoming obsessed with it. I wouldn't know . I'm just busy momma racing off to make a train. Hamilton: An American Musical

content: The U.S. Attorney General, Jeff Sessions set to arrive at the federal courthouse here in Central Islip, Suffolk County. He will discuss the MS-13 gang problem with lawmakers and the families of victims...But he will also be greeted by protesters urging him not to politicize this into an anti-immigrant response. Stay with ABC7NY for full coverage.

content: These purple pansies I planted last season came back beautifully!! And.. they are a great early season match for my sugarsnap peas sitting right behind them. They both like the colder weather we were having. Hope the rest of my garden doesn't freeze later this week wen the temps drop again!
name: Stacey Sager
title: Timeline Photos

content: Nature regenerating. For those who don't garden... These are called "seed potatoes"... They are basically these wonky,untreated potatoes with sprouts from the eyes. Gardeners love this because you can slice them and plant them to grow new ones! So as I was planting, a crazy thing happened! I realized I had old purple potatoes in the ground from last year! As an experiment...My older daughter will now try to grow new potatoes from these babies as well. We'll see!
name: Stacey Sager
title: Photos from Stacey Sager's post

content: More MS-13 gang members rounded up....This time, 3 arrested for attempted murder with a machete and a gun - in Nassau County. 2 here illegally. A third was awaiting a green card. According to the criminal complaint..they attacked a teen for... LAUGHING. Details at noon. On ABC7NY

content: Are your kids taking the state math tests this week? Or, opting out? Either way...parents have rights...This charter school mom just thinks the tests are bad for their curriculum. She exercised her son's "right to refuse"..But Success Academy sure didn't make it easy. She speaks out to us, here.

content: $21 million is a LOTTA MONEY!!! And because of their philanthropy, we'll be that much closer to having answers about BRCA mutations for our children, and their children..Having a personal stake in the battle, Mindy and Jon Gray are doing phenomenal work for a cause that is so meaningful. I am proud to be a 2-time BRCA related cancer survivor on the Leadership Council of their amazing Basser Center, dedicated solely for this purpose. Brilliant people. But also KIND people!! Basser Center for BRCA
name: Stacey Sager
title: Blackstone's Gray Gives $21 Million to Hit Cancer Close to Home

content: Honored to attend this event on Sunday in Teaneck.. A group that truly cares about cancer support, advocacy, and awareness. Hope to honor some awesome women!! Sharsheret #survivor
name: Stacey Sager
title: Sharsheret

content: Honored to share my story as a BRCA1 survivor of breast and ovarian cancer today in Teaneck, New Jersey with my dear friends at Sharsheret. It is the largest Jewish organization providing peer support to women with cancer. These are some seriously strong, unstoppable women. And thanks to my hubs for being by my side!! ABC7NY
name: Stacey Sager
title: Photos from Stacey Sager's post

content: Motherhood is constant juggling. It is respecting your child for who they are...It is having no playbook because kids are just not robots.... It is the knowledge that you cannot do it all, you can only do your best. It is knowing priorities...It is trying the homemade recipe your kid makes, no matter how questionable...It is a serious loss of sleep, like, for YEARSüò≥üò≥...It is heartwarming and hilarious...It is both the greatest sacrifice and the greatest gift....It is teaching your kids the importance of strength and independence - and convincing yourself to let go of them a bit so they can learn to overcome life's struggles. It is by far the toughest yet most rewarding gig around. It is knowing the deepest meaning of love....So to every hard working, smart, and dedicated mommy.... I salute you. You may think no one notices... BUT.... make no mistake.. you are doing great work!!!!
name: Stacey Sager
title: Photos from Stacey Sager's post

content: Miss you, mom. Here's to all you taught me, and all of you I now see in my girls, and I hope I have made you proud. ü•Ç‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

content: Major props to our girlies tonight!! It has not been an easy 24 hours for our family... we were evacuated from our home all last night because our neighbor's home was on fire and the fear was, our home wasn't safe either. In fact this photo shows a home on the other side, where the wind took the flames. Our home was spared by chance...our neighbors lost everything but they survived, thank goodness!!!! ...and both my girls had performances this evening after a full day of school in 90 degree heat, with no sleep!!! My children's resilience today was so inspiring!!! Wish I was as awake as they wereüòÖüòÖüòÖ... But as they say... tomorrow is another day.
name: Stacey Sager
title: Photos from Stacey Sager's post

content: ABC7NY
name: Stacey Sager
title: ABC7NY

content: Armored vehicle and guns drawn after a man barricades himself inside St.John's Catholic Church in Center Moriches. Sources tell ABC7NY he walked in with a gas can at around 1:30 this afternoon. We will have the very latest in a live report.
name: Stacey Sager
title: Photos from Stacey Sager's post

content: Takes a village!!! The week of "divide and conquer" in our house....you know when your kids' "stuff" all collides????? My big girl's school choir kicking off the Mets game at CitiField tonight, while mommy worked late on 3 live shots in Suffolk County, then raced to temple for another sort of "kickoff"... the start of our dear friend's daughter's bat mitzvah...Meanwhile, our blessed nanny, Chrystle (‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è) took our little one to her dress rehearsal for this weekend's dance recital (same day as her play on Sunday) and then on to mom and dad tonight. Executing all of this felt like a Navy SEAL operation!!! When it rains... it pours..And you thought the work week was busy??? Thx Karishma and Sandeep for all your help!! And thx, Chrystle!!! And thx for the great pictures and videos!!
name: Stacey Sager
title: Photos from Stacey Sager's post
